name: Lit Paths
description:
Would like to give a shout out to HitCtrl for the awesome sound in this project, please look him up on OpenGameArt.org!

Small project to help me get use to Game Jams again. I'm using the free version of Construct 2 so there are some limitations.

Total time spent on project <= 24 Hours

You can also play the game on:

https://www.scirra.com/arcade/adventure-games/lit-paths-25861
